text: Peyronie's Disease is a condition that causes scar tissue to form within the penis. It can make the penis bend or curve during an erection. This can cause pain. In some cases, it can cause difficulties with sexual intercourse. The exact cause of Peyronie's Disease is not fully understood. It is believed to be associated with injury to the penis that does not heal properly. ==References== Category:Diseases and disorders Category:Penis
title: Peyronie's disease
